name: Nimbus Run
description:
Description

In this game you use a simple push and release mechanic to hop from cloud to cloud trying to travel as far as possible while collecting gems used to unlock new characters. While it may seem easy at first theres alot of diferrent suprises and obstacle that may slow you down.

Features

  • Unique movement mechanic
  • Endless randomly generated Level
  • Unlockable Characters
  • Achievements and Goals

How to play

If you're on your pc, use the mouse to pull the yellow circle that is around the player character and a white line should appear showing you where the character will land once you release. Pro Tip: You can also pull mid-air, but only when the yellow circle is yellow.

Credits to William Bradwell for the awesome music!

Hope you enjoy this one! 

Comments and Feedback are much appreciated
